Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.7.10-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.7.10-19. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-process-exporter is earlier than 0.7.10-19, affected by CVE-2021-44716
